sourcesContent:
const drinksData = [
    {
        id: 1,
        name: "Spanish Latte",
        description: "A rich and creamy coffee drink that combines espresso with sweetened condensed milk, creating a perfect balance of bold coffee flavor and sweetness.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 shots of espresso",
                "2 tbsp sweetened condensed milk",
                "1/2 cup steamed milk",
                "Ice (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Pull two shots of espresso",
                "Add sweetened condensed milk to the cup",
                "Pour the espresso over the condensed milk and stir",
                "Top with steamed milk",
                "Add ice if making iced version"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Creamy",
            "Sweet",
            "Caramel-like",
            "Smooth"
        ],
        origin: "Spain",
        variations: [
            "Iced Spanish Latte",
            "Dirty Spanish Latte (with extra espresso)",
            "Coconut Spanish Latte"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1561047029-3000c68339ca?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        name: "Matcha Latte",
        description: "A vibrant green tea latte made with finely ground matcha powder, offering a perfect balance of earthy flavors and creamy texture.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 tsp matcha powder",
                "2 tbsp hot water",
                "1 cup steamed milk",
                "1 tsp honey or sweetener (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Sift matcha powder into a cup",
                "Add hot water and whisk until frothy",
                "Heat and froth the milk",
                "Pour the milk over the matcha mixture",
                "Add sweetener if desired"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Earthy",
            "Creamy",
            "Slightly Bitter",
            "Umami"
        ],
        origin: "Japan",
        variations: [
            "Iced Matcha Latte",
            "Matcha Frappuccino",
            "Matcha with Coconut Milk"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564890369478-c89ca6d9cde9?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        name: "Dalgona Coffee",
        description: "A viral Korean coffee drink featuring a fluffy, whipped coffee topping that sits on top of iced milk.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 tbsp instant coffee",
                "2 tbsp sugar",
                "2 tbsp hot water",
                "1 cup milk",
                "Ice"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Mix instant coffee, sugar, and hot water",
                "Whip until thick and creamy",
                "Fill a glass with ice and milk",
                "Top with the whipped coffee mixture"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Sweet",
            "Creamy",
            "Strong Coffee Flavor",
            "Light and Fluffy"
        ],
        origin: "South Korea",
        variations: [
            "Dalgona Matcha",
            "Dalgona Chocolate",
            "Dalgona with Almond Milk"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596075780750-81249df16d19?w=800"
    }
];

export default drinksData;
